vote.title: Authorize a construction contract for roof maintenance and roof emergency on-call repair service at Dallas Water Utilities facilities located citywide and at Lake Ray Hubbard, Lake Fork and Lake Tawakoni - Texas Roof Management, Inc., only bidder - Not to exceed $1,331,127.50 - Financing:  Storm Drainage Management Capital Construction Fund ($58,014.81), Wastewater Construction Fund ($576,125.48), and Water Utilities Capital Construction Fund ($696,987.21)
vote.description: Authorize a construction contract for roof maintenance and roof emergency on-call repair service at Dallas Water Utilities facilities located citywide and at Lake Ray Hubbard, Lake Fork and Lake Tawakoni - Texas Roof Management, Inc., only bidder - Not to exceed $1,331,127.50 - Financing:  Storm Drainage Management Capital Construction Fund ($58,014.81), Wastewater Construction Fund ($576,125.48), and Water Utilities Capital Construction Fund ($696,987.21)
